meanings.definition: A machine that makes copies of documents or images.
meanings.sent1: The photocopier at the library is always busy.
meanings.sent2: I need to use the photocopier to duplicate these papers.
meanings.sent3: The photocopier and the printer had a race to see who could finish first.
meanings.sent4: Her memory works like a photocopier, replicating every detail perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The photocopier hummed softly as it reproduced the important document.

meanings.definition: To make a copy of a document or image using a photocopier.
meanings.sent1: I will photocopier the report for you right away.
meanings.sent2: She photocopiers all the receipts for her records.
meanings.sent3: The detective decided to photocopier the evidence for safekeeping.
meanings.sent4: His mind seemed to photocopier the image, storing it for later use.
meanings.sent5: Please remember to photocopier your ID before coming to the meeting.
